title: Was Amy Winehouse a music genius? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simple Answer! Nope far from it. More elaborate answer! Well although Amy Winehouse had a fantastic voice, she did nothing we’ve not heard before. And for all the credit she gets for her hit album Back to Black she gets, Mark Ronson and Salaam Remi deserve just as much, if not more for building the Album around her voice, (otherwise she just becomes another Duffy) which like I say is fantastic but she was a mere Billie Holiday impressionist in my book. E/D

100 million percent yes… nobody can imitate her, she had a way of phrasing that was so unique, she could improvise on the fly, never sang a song the same way twice….and boy did she FEEL it. That voice was from another dimension. Her songs that were SO different yet pulled together so many influences….she was an incredible naturally gifted songwriter, truly a musical genius who sadly didn’t realise how great she was.
